$bio.description: Born in Vlora, Albania on 12th of March.
Just at the age of 3 I was interacting with my first computer, playing games like Tetris and watching cartoons.
I started to learn how to use computers and made my first website on note pad.
A cousin of mine introduced me to the world of Minecraft, a sandbox game that had just came out and it gave you the freedom to do anything and create things only limited by my imagination.

After playing Minecraft for a year, I was growing curious about how people created such games and I started to check out tutorials on how to make games. I started to look around in the Minecraft modding community and I found a mod creation tool called 'Minecraft Coder Pack' which used Java as a programming language.
Started working as a local freelancer in web development and UI/UX design.
Got an internship at Division5 as a Frontend Developer in React for one year maintaining 2 projects, an e-commerce electronic store and a mobile app made in Electron (React).
Joined the University of Vlora, Albania to study Computer Science.
Graduated from the University of Vlora, with a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science. I'm currently working as a freelance developer and I'm always looking for new projects.

$projects.description: A forum / blog website used by the students to get information about subjects and undertake courses or quizzes about the classes they enroll.
$projects.author: Sixhei Tartari

$projects.description: A landing page for a therapist including (About Me - Contact Form - General Information - Services)
$projects.author: Sixhei Tartari

$projects.description: A landing page for the events of Sound Me Youth in the capital of Albania, Tirana, about the wellbeing and mental state of the Albanian youth.
$projects.author: Sixhei Tartari

$projects.description: A webpage made in plain HTML. It's a numbers game with time tracking your addition and subtraction and giving you a score at the end.
$projects.author: Sixhei Tartari

$projects.description: This is the product of a research I did with my Cyber Security professor in the University of Vlora, Albania. I implemented the RSA algorithm in C++ and I did the testing of the algorithm.
$projects.author: Sixhei Tartari

$projects.description: My first attempt on creating a functional website. Having a boring topic, I didn't have much to work with and also now that I look back at it, I am ashamed, not too much to say anyway.
$projects.author: Sixhei Tartari
